text: allahu avatarippiccat ninnal pin parri jivikkuka enn avareat arenkilum parannal, alla, nannalute pitakkal svikariccatayi kantate nannal pin parrukayullu ennayirikkum avar parayunnatâ€Œ. avarute pitakkal yateannum cinticc manas'silakkattavarum nervali kantettattavarumayirunnenkil pealum (avare pin parrukayanea)
